Package net.pocorall.automaton

Finite-state automaton for regular expressions.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Automaton  
    AutomatonProvider
    DefaultAutomaton provider for RegExp.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AutomatonMatcher
    A tool that performs match operations on a given character sequence using a compiled automaton.
    BasicAutomataFactory
    Construction of basic automata.
    BasicOperations
    Basic automata operations.
    Datatypes
    Basic automata for representing common datatypes related to Unicode, XML, and XML Schema.
    DatatypesAutomatonProvider
    DefaultAutomaton provider based on Datatypes.
    DefaultAutomaton
    Finite-state automaton with regular expression operations.
    LinkedAutomaton  
    MinimizationOperations
    Operations for minimizing automata.
    RegExp
    Regular Expression extension to DefaultAutomaton.
    RunAutomaton
    Finite-state automaton with fast run operation.
    ShuffleOperations
    Automata operations involving shuffling.
    SpecialOperations
    Special automata operations.
    State
    DefaultAutomaton state.
    StatePair
    Pair of states.
    StringUnionOperations
    Operations for building minimal deterministic automata from sets of strings.
    Transition

Package net.pocorall.automaton Description

Finite-state automaton for regular expressions.

This package contains a full DFA/NFA implementation with Unicode alphabet and support for all standard (and a number of non-standard) regular expression operations.

The most commonly used functionality is located in the classes LinkedAutomaton and RegExp.

For more information, go to the package home page at https://github.com/pocorall/automaton.
